text: Melicope glabra is a tree in the [family Rutaceae. The specific epithet ' is from the Latin meaning "hairless". ==Description== Melicope glabra grows up to tall. The fruits are round to elliptic and measure up to long. ==Distribution and habitat== Melicope glabra grows naturally in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Singapore, Java and Borneo. Its habitat is primary forest from sea-level to altitude, sometimes to . ==References== glabra Category:Trees of Malaya Category:Trees of Java Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Trees of Sumatra Category:Plants described in 1823
title: Melicope glabra
